thread.title: Mike Ball

author: Mike Ball
title: Mike Ball
text: When my fianc√©s car tyre had a rather large hole in it, the first thought was to put on the spare but with no spare and the repair kit no use due to the size of the hole we found tyres on the drive! With a very reasonable Quote: we booked to have a next day repair, within 2 minutes from getting the Quote: we had a phone call with the 2 hour time slot. Next day they arrived on time with the job done in a matter of minutes, can not rate the service high enough. Massive thank you!
